thi-ap25:3.1: 5 Nandātherīapadāna → nandājanapadakalyāṇī apadānaṃ (bj, pts1) | sundarīnandātherī apadānaṃ (aṭṭha.)
thi-ap25:38.1: Na vañcakālo subhage → na pañhakālo subhage (bj) | na pañhakālo subhaṇe (s2, s3) | na pañhakālo subhage (pts1)
thi-ap25:45.3: Doḷālolāva → doḷālolā ca (bj) | dāmāmālañca (s2, s3) | dolālocā ca (pts1) | dololullāva (mr)
thi-ap25:47.1: Vedimajjhāva sussoṇī → tanumajjhā puthussoṇī (bj) | vedimajjhā puthussoṇi (s2, s3) | vedimajjhā puthussoṇī (pts1)
